00025 
00026 void ObjectModelCircle::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate,
00027                 bool &modelFound){
00028 
00029         std::vector<int> samples;
00030         std::vector<int> selection;
00031         getSamples(iterations,selection);
00032 
00033         if (selection.size () == 0){
00034                 isDegenerate = false;
00035                 modelFound = false;
00036                 return;
00037         } else {
00038 
00039                 isDegenerate = true;
00040 
00041         }
00042 
00043         if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00044                 modelFound = false;
00045                 return;
00046         } else {
00047                 modelFound = true;
00048                 return;
00049         }
00050 
00051 
00052 }
00053 
00054 void
00055 ObjectModelCircle::getSamples (int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples)
00056 {
00057         assert(this->inputPointCloud!=NULL);
00058 
00059         samples.resize (3);
00060         double trand = this->inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00061 
00062         // Get a random number between 1 and max_indices
00063         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00064         // Get the index
00065         samples[0] = idx;
00066 
00067         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00068         do
00069         {
00070                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00071                 samples[1] = idx;
00072                 iterations++;
00073         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00074         iterations--;
00075 
00076 //      this->points = inputPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00077 
00078         // Get the values at the two points
00079         Eigen::Vector2d p0 = Eigen::Vector2d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY());
00080         Eigen::Vector2d p1 = Eigen::Vector2d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY());
00081 
00082         // Compute the segment values (in 2d) between p1 and p0
00083         p1 -= p0;
00084 
00085         Eigen::Vector2d dy1dy2;
00086         int iter = 0;
00087         do
00088         {
00089                 // Get the third point, different from the first two
00090                 do
00091                 {
00092                         idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00093                         samples[2] = idx;
00094                         iterations++;
00095                 } while ( (samples[2] == samples[1]) || (samples[2] == samples[0]) );
00096                 iterations--;
00097 
00098                 Eigen::Vector2d p2 = Eigen::Vector2d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY());
00099 
00100                 // Compute the segment values (in 2d) between p2 and p0
00101                 p2 -= p0;
00102 
00103 #ifdef EIGEN3
00104                 dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00105 #else
00106                 dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00107 #endif
00108                 ++iter;
00109                 if (iter > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR )
00110                 {
00111                         cout<<"[SampleConsensusModelCircle::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select "
00112                                         "3 non collinear points in"<<
00113                                         MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR <<" iterations!";
00114                         break;
00115                 }
00116                 iterations++;
00117         }
00118         while ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) );
00119         iterations--;
00120 }
00121 
00122 bool
00123 ObjectModelCircle::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients)
00124 {
00125         assert (samples.size () == 3);
00126 
00127         model_coefficients.resize (3);
00128 
00129         Eigen::Vector2d p0 ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY());
00130         Eigen::Vector2d p1 ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY());
00131         Eigen::Vector2d p2 ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY());
00132 
00133         Eigen::Vector2d u = (p0 + p1) / 2.0;
00134         Eigen::Vector2d v = (p1 + p2) / 2.0;
00135 
00136         Eigen::Vector2d p1p0dif = p1 - p0;
00137         Eigen::Vector2d p2p1dif = p2 - p1;
00138         Eigen::Vector2d uvdif   = u - v;
00139 
00140         Eigen::Vector2d m = Eigen::Vector2d (- p1p0dif[0] / p1p0dif[1], - p2p1dif[0] / p2p1dif[1]);
00141 
00142         // Center (x, y)
00143         model_coefficients[0] = (m[0] * u[0] -  m[1] * v[0]  - uvdif[1] )             / (m[0] - m[1]);
00144         model_coefficients[1] = (m[0] * m[1] * uvdif[0] +  m[0] * v[1] - m[1] * u[1]) / (m[0] - m[1]);
00145 
00146         // Radius
00147         model_coefficients[2] = sqrt ((model_coefficients[0] - p0[0]) * (model_coefficients[0] - p0[0]) +
00148                         (model_coefficients[1] - p0[1]) * (model_coefficients[1] - p0[1]));
00149         return (true);
00150 }
00151 
00156 void
00157 ObjectModelCircle:: getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, std::vector<double> &distances)
00158 {
00159         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 3);
00160 
00161         distances.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00162 
00163         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the circle
00164         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00165                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the circle as the difference between
00166                 // dist(point,circle_origin) and circle_radius
00167                 distances[i] = fabs (sqrt (
00168                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) *
00169                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) +
00170 
00171                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() - model_coefficients[1] ) *
00172                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() - model_coefficients[1] )
00173                 ) - model_coefficients[2]);
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 void
00178 ObjectModelCircle::getInlierDistance (std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,
00179                 std::vector<double> &distances) {
00180 
00181         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 3);
00182 
00183         distances.resize (inliers.size());
00184 
00185         for (size_t i = 0; i < inliers.size (); ++i)
00186         {
00187                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the circle as the difference between
00188                 // dist(point,circle_origin) and circle_radius
00189                 distances[i]=fabs (sqrt (
00190                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) *
00191                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) +
00192 
00193                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY() - model_coefficients[1] ) *
00194                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY() - model_coefficients[1] )
00195                 ) - model_coefficients[2]);
00196         }
00197 }
00198 
00199 void
00200 ObjectModelCircle::selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold, std::vector<int> &inliers)
00201 {
00202 
00203         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 3);
00204 
00205         int nr_p = 0;
00206         inliers.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00207 
00208         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the sphere
00209         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00210         {
00211                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the sphere as the difference between
00212                 // dist(point,sphere_origin) and sphere_radius
00213                 float distance = fabs (sqrt (
00214                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) *
00215                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) +
00216 
00217                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() - model_coefficients[1] ) *
00218                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() - model_coefficients[1] )
00219                 ) - model_coefficients[2]);
00220                 if (distance < threshold)
00221                 {
00222                         // Returns the indices of the points whose distances are smaller than the threshold
00223                         inliers[nr_p] = i;
00224                         nr_p++;
00225                 }
00226         }
00227         inliers.resize (nr_p);
00228 }
00229 
00230 bool
00231 ObjectModelCircle:: doSamplesVerifyModel (const std::set<int> &indices, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold)
00232 {
00233         assert (model_coefficients.size () == 3);
00234 
00235         for (std::set<int>::iterator it = indices.begin (); it != indices.end (); ++it)
00236                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the sphere as the difference between
00237                 //dist(point,sphere_origin) and sphere_radius
00238                 if (fabs (sqrt (
00239                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) *
00240                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getX() - model_coefficients[0] ) +
00241                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getY() - model_coefficients[1] ) *
00242                                 ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getY() - model_coefficients[1] )
00243                 ) - model_coefficients[2]) > threshold)
00244                         return (false);
00245 
00246         return (true);
00247 }
